info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Garfield and east central Iron Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 315 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Paragonah, or 20 miles northeast of Cedar City, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parowan, Paragonah and Summit. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 67 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
